articles.title: Tax Collection At Source — A Penalty On Tax Payers To Pay For The Incompetence Of The Government To Catch Evaders - CNBCTV18
articles.description: This high Tax Collected at Source (TCS) would be fair provided the government pays a minimum 10 percent to all those who are able to prove that they are tax payers. Such a rule will also force the Income Tax department to process the refunds quickly.
